features: 【LED Design】The upgraded version mouse with the LED lights adds more fun to the boring office life. The bottom of the mouse has a switch, you can switch lights freely. Low-key or sparkle, switch in one second, suitable for any occasion.

【Rechargeable Optical Mouse】Built-in durable rechargeable battery, it can be easily charged using the included USB cable without replacing the battery. Just 2 hours of charging, you can use it for about 7-15 days. Standby time is very long, and energy-saving features, automatic sleep mode, and wake-up mode are installed to save energy. Turn off the mouse LED light when not in use to save power.

【Plug and Play】No need to install any driver, just plug the USB receiver into your laptop will the mouse start to serve. 2.4GHz wireless technology provides a powerful and reliable connection, effective up to 10 meters of range. Advanced optical tracking technology with fast click and responsiveness. 3-Level adjustable DPI (800/1200/1600 DPI), freely to satisfy daily work. Equipped with a USB-C to USB adapter, lets you worry-free use of any device.

【Mute Click & Comfortable Hand-feeling】Silent click Mouse with classic design with anti-fingerprint finish offers your hand maximum support and comfort. The silent button reduces 90% noises, which makes it an ideal wireless mouse for offices, conference rooms, cafes, libraries, and bedrooms, helps you concentrate on your work, and study without disturbing others besides you. Ultra-thin, ergonomic design, lightweight, and convenient for carrying or traveling.

【Wide Compatibility】Well compatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, and 10 / Windows Vista / Windows Vista/ Windows ME, etc, Fits for desktop, laptop, PC, Macbook, and other devices. Please Note: If your laptop is just with a type-c port, You need to connect the supplied USB-C to the USB adapter to your laptop and plug the USB receiver into it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OKIMO LED Wireless Mouse 7 Colorful LED breathing light change alternately, soothing light lights up the mouse in dark, adds more fun to the life. Note: It can't be set to one specific color. How to use it? * Charge the mouse for about 2 hours before using it for the first time. 1. Take the dongle out, which is stored at the bottom of the mouse. 2. Insert the dongle into the USB port of your device, and open the mouse switch (at the bottom of the mouse). 3. Allow a few seconds for installing, no action needed, just wait. Then you can use it. Note: If your computer is Type-C port, please insert the USB-C to USB receiver into the Type-c port of the device first, then insert the USB receiver into the USB-C to USB receiver. Turn on the power switch and the mouse will work. Tips: The mouse cursor will move slowly or stop moving when the mouse is low battery. Please charge it on time. The blue light beside the scroll wheel will be on while charging, and then goes off when the mouse is fully charged.

Rechargeable Function It can be easily charged using the included USB cable without replacing the battery. Support charging while using, more energy saving. 3-Level DPI Adjustable The slim wireless mouse has 3-level DPI adjustable mode to meet your different demands, experience smooth tracking on most surfaces. Mute Mouse - Noiseless Click Silent button reduces 90% noises, which makes it an ideal wireless mouse for office, conference room, cafe, library, bedroom, help you concentrate on your work, study without disturbing others besides you.

Strong Durability High precision, accurate laser tracking, fast responsiveness. Meet Your Multiple Needs Support for Type-c port device. Whether your device is equipped with a USB port or Type-C port, you can use it. The USB receiver was stored in the bottom of the mouse. Symmetry Design Slim ergonomic design and smooth surface for an incredible user experience. Symmetrical design allows it to fit both hands, you can choose it as you like, easy to master.

Products Specification Size 112*58*25MM Weight 67.2g Work distance 10M DPI 800/ 1200/ 1600DPI Key number 4 What You Get 1* Wireless Mouse; 1* USB Charging Cable; 1* Nano Receiver; 1* USB-C to USB Receiver; 1* User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t last very long
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and prefer a wireless mouse to be able to move freely. For the first 6 months this mouse worked perfectly, never had any connectivity issues or issues with the mouse itself.Eventually I noticed the scroll wheel wouldn’t work properly. Little things like scrolling down either wouldn’t register or would start scrolling up instead. It would do this for a few seconds then start working properly. This began gradually and then became more frequent.I then started to notice a precipitous drop in the battery life, going from lasting a full week to just one day. I do use it all day so it may be that the battery just doesn’t have the capacity for long work hours.The issue now is that the laser does not recognize where I’m moving. It will either not register me moving and I’ll need to move several times to get where I want, or it will move on its own to a completely different part of the screen.This mouse started out wonderful, but became almost useless. I guess $10 for about a year is okay. If you’re looking for a cheap mouse that you’ll only use sparingly, this is a good option. If you want a mouse for working and will use it everyday, 8 hours per day, shell out the money for a higher quality mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and cute!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for jobs requiring a lot of time on the computer. I use mine for 12h charting and it’s been great!It’s also pretty good quality for $10. I’d say go for it if you want to switch things up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This thing works well most of the time. If you don’t turn it off and just let it go to sleep mode, it dies fairly quickly but you still get a couple of days of use out of it (if you’re not using it 8 hours a day, at least). If you turn it off every time you’re done though you can get probably a month but at least 2 weeks out of it with moderate use. I originally bought it to use with my iPad, however the case on my iPad wouldn’t really allow the USB-C to plug into the charger port. I wish they made an option to get either a USB or a USB-C plug as you get both with this mouse but you have to plug the USB into the USB-C adapter which makes the USB-C plug significantly thicker than necessary. Now I use it for my MacBook. Just a warning, if you want it to scroll like a regular mouse you have to change it in the setting of the computer (but that’s a MacBook problem not a problem with this mouse, not all of Apple’s setting decisions make sense but that’s nothing new). I do really like that I can chose to just turn on the mouse with a solid red color (which preserves battery) or turn it on to change colors (reduces how much time you get out of the mouse but is a cool feature). My only complaint is that sometimes the mouse isn’t tracking perfectly and the cursor is in a completely different place than I would expect it to be (further behind where I was moving it to rather than the cursor doing its own thing), but that may also be a thing I have to change on the laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better for small hands
reviews.reviewText: I wear size medium gloves to give you some context. These mice are good for small hands and a good solution for a laptop bag because they're so thin. Not ergonomic but not uncomfortable either. It shuts off when not in use to preserve the charge. I was surprised at how long the charge holds given how light weight the mouse is. To be on the safe side, get accustomed to plugging it back in to charge when you leave work/play for the day. I thought this was going to be my replacement mouse for my old one that finally died but I think I'll spend a little more to get a wired ergonomic mouse. I am keeping this one as a backup because it is so thin and lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Kind of flimsy.
reviews.reviewText: It's okay, but you can feel right away that it's a little flimsy. I don't use it that much and the scroll wheel has already broken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Stylish and small to fit well in my laptop carrier when I want to do some work outside of the house. I love the color and the lights are so cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LED Wireless Slim Silent 2.4G portable mouse
reviews.reviewText: I love the dynamics of this LED Wireless Mouse, Slim Silent Mouse 2.4G Portable Mobile Optical Office Mouse. I love how the mouse changes colors with movement. This mouse is slim and fits well with the hand. It's smooth glide across the mouse pad makes it effortless not having hand fatigue. I also like the fact that you can charge this mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: connects well, no noticable lag, low profile, clicking the mouse is almost completely silent and the lights are bright. no issues at all.
. La luz le da un toque bonito

reviews.reviewTitle: Low battery capacity, constant disconnection issues, not worth the price.
reviews.reviewText: Not happy with the product, besides having to charge the mouse every week due to the low capacity of the battery. The mouse keeps on disconnecting after a few minutes of inactivity. Not worth the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: não faz nenhum ruido, totalmente silencioso
reviews.reviewText: O mouse é bonito, com bom acabamento, levissimo, acende os leds em varias cores, é silencioso, porém não possui receptor tipo C.
amei o produto MUITO BARATA e além do conforto de usa-lo ele é bem bonito gostei de verdade estão de parabéns
